definition: to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Quick login using Employee Swipe Card or Employee Barcode Card.
sentences.chinese: 快速登录使用员工或员工刷卡条码卡。

sentences.english: In these countries merchants therefore usually ask for ID.
sentences.chinese: 在这些国家，商户通常要求使用ID卡刷卡。

sentences.english: These cards allow you to tap readers at gas stations pumps or check-out counters.
sentences.chinese: 人们可以用这种信用卡在加油站或者柜台刷卡结帐。

sentences.english: The system would also include online reservations and a card swiping system to track costs.
sentences.chinese: 该系统也包括在网上预定和刷卡系统来追踪成本。

sentences.english: Door can only be opened by swiping card or pressing button.
sentences.chinese: 此门需要刷卡或按下按钮后方能开启。

sentences.english: Brush card not to receive poundage.
When chip card is swiped must ask to insert card.
sentences.chinese: 当芯片卡刷卡必须要求插入卡。

sentences.english: You pay in cash or card?
Unlike spending real cash, when you charge it to a card you don’t feel the burn.
sentences.chinese: 不像花现钞，当你刷卡时你不会感觉象是在割肉。

sentences.english: Research on the compound decision model of the price structure and bankcard consumption.
sentences.chinese: 银行卡网络价格结构与刷卡消费组合决策模型研究。

sentences.english: Hurstville Park plaza, one big locked garage for rent, security card to entry.
sentences.chinese: 现有一上锁车库出租，空间大，刷卡入门。

sentences.english: Will all be cash or charge?
Workers should brush cards every time if work at twice.
sentences.chinese: 如果每日分两次上班者，每次均须刷卡。

sentences.english: And mobile friends that can act as a credit card and television all-in-one.
sentences.chinese: 还有可以刷卡看电视的手机。

sentences.english: It’s normal for the card to be swiped through a point of sale terminal or keyboard card reader.
sentences.chinese: 用POS机或是键盘读卡器刷卡是正常的。

sentences.english: My card went through on the rave ticket but denied the college application fee.
sentences.chinese: 舞会的票能刷卡，大学的学费却刷不了。

definition: to pay a sum of money/payment
to withdraw money from a bank
public transportation card/prepaid transit card/subway pass
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
